snippet.title: Plants vs Zombies 2: Odyssey IS OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Download link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1D6A1UlzzQTT7Vp0QXJuNaA5q7GPATPBg?usp=sharing
Discord server: https://discord.gg/RKehg4E9dh
After 5 months of development, many hours working, even more hours fixing bugs, it's finally here.
Plants vs. Zombies 2: Odyssey 1.0 is released to all of you, and it includes:
- 10 levels of Suburbia (world 1)
- 10 levels of Football Pitch (world 2)
- 8 levels of Feastivus (limited-time event)
- 15 Adventure Plants
- 12 Adventure Zombies
- 8 Coinium (store) Plants
- 2 Feastivus Plants (Missile Toe & Holly Barrier)
You can download it above.
I really hope you enjoy it, and it won't have any bigger issues, but if you encounter any bug, don't like something and have an idea on how to fix it/make it better, go to comments section or Odyssey channels on my discord server and say whatever you want to say. I will really appreciate feedback and criticism.
